name: PixelJack
description:
OBS.: It is highly recommended to download the game as the web version may cause some issues

My first full solo game made in LUA with LOVE2D framework

BlackJack Rules:

You have to stay close as possible to 21, if you execed you burst and lose, the dealer stops drawing cards when he reach 17 or more, your goal is to make more points than him

GitHub Repository: https://github.com/dag0none/BlackJack-Lua

Made with a lot of LOVE s2
